examples.translation: 设计师被授予全权设计一个新的城市中心区.
examples.first: The architect was given/presented with a
examples.last: cheque to design a new city centre.

examples.translation: 大家对她的解释茫然不解.
我想不起来把伞丢在哪儿了, 一点印象都没有!
examples.first: I can't think where I've left my umbrella; my mind's a complete

n: a blank character used to separate successive words in writing or printing
a blank gap or missing part
a piece of material ready to be made into something
adj: (of a surface) not written or printed on
v: keep the opposing (baseball) team from winning

adj: 空白的, 茫然的, 全部的, 面无表情的, 未完工的
n: 空白(处), 空隙, 空虚, (有弹药而无弹头的)空弹
vt: 使模糊不清, 删除, 封闭, (比赛时连续得分)使对手得零分
